sentence.Network_en: During their summer holidays they cruised further afield to Normandy and Brittany.
sentence.Network_cn: 暑期他们乘船到更远的诺曼底和布列塔尼游览。

sentence.Network_en: British tour companies are nudging clients to travel further afield.
sentence.Network_cn: 英国旅游公司正鼓动客户到更远的地方去旅游。

sentence.Network_en: Many of those arrested came from far afield.
sentence.Network_cn: 那些被捕者有许多来自很远的地方。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English  (in sense 2): from a- 'on, in' + field

entry.def: Further afield or farther afield means in places or areas other than the nearest or most obvious one.

example.ex: They enjoy participating in a wide variety of activities, both locally and further afield...
example.tran: 他们乐于参与本地及外地的各种活动。

example.ex: You are not allowed to bring plants in from further afield without a licence.
example.tran: 未经许可不得从外地带入植物。

entry.def: If someone comes from far afield, they come from a long way away.

example.ex: Many of those arrested came from far afield.
example.tran: 那些被捕者有许多来自很远的地方。

means.word_mean: 1. far away from home or one's usual surroundings;

sentences.sentence: "looking afield for new lands to conquer"- R.A.Hall

means.word_mean: 2. in or into a field (especially a field of battle);

sentences.sentence: "the armies were afield, challenging the enemy's advance"
"unlawful to carry hunting rifles afield until the season opens"

means.word_mean: 3. off the subject; beyond the point at issue;

sentences.sentence: "such digressions can lead us too far afield"

auth_sentence.content: Otherwise, you've either fallen short or ventured afield.
auth_sentence.res_content: Otherwise, you've either fallen short or ventured afield.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Otherwise, you've either fallen short or ventured afield.

auth_sentence.content: This summer it attracted artists from farther afield.
auth_sentence.res_content: This summer it attracted artists from farther afield.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This summer it attracted artists from farther afield.

auth_sentence.content: Yet some people will be looking further afield.
auth_sentence.res_content: Yet some people will be looking further afield.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Yet some people will be looking further afield.

sentences.en: One day she wandered further afield.
sentences.cn: 有一天她游荡到更远的地方。

sentences.en: You can hire a car if you want to explore further afield.
sentences.cn: 如果你还想逛更远的地方,可以租辆车。

sentences.en: Don’t go too far afield or you’ll get lost.
sentences.cn: 别走得太远, 要不然你会迷路的。

sentences.en: Journalists came from as far afield as China and Brazil.
sentences.cn: 新闻记者来自中国和巴西等远方国度。

sentences.en: Once he starts talking, he will go far afield from his original topic.
sentences.cn: 他只要一开始说话，就会偏离原来的话题。
